details.description: Create a new petition, or search and sign other people's petitions to the UK government
details.more_information: To create or sign an e-petition, you must be a British citizen or a UK resident.
details.introduction: You can create a new petition (to support a cause or ask for a change in policy or the law), or search and sign other people’s petitions. You’ll need to give your name, email address and home address.
details.alternate_methods: You can still submit a paper petition to the House of Commons. Find out about the process of petitioning through an MP on the UK Parliament website.
